text: Imphal 1944 () is 2014 WWII feature movie based on the Battle of Imphal. It was directed and produced by Japanese actor and filmmaker Junichi Kajioka. It was based on London. It was produced on the 70th Anniversary Commemoration of the Battle of Imphal (WWII) in Imphal on 28th June, 2014. Notably, the film was screened in the Cannes Film Festival in 2015. == References == Category:Japanese-Meitei culture Category:World War II movies Category:2010s war movies Category:2010s English-language movies Category:Japanese-language movies Category:2014 movies
title: Imphal 1944
